Contributor: Treidler, Adolph, artist.; American Legion, publisher.; Carey Print Lith., lithographer, printer.;
Note: Signed "Adolph Treidler." Date based on date of development of the American Legion.  Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text tells that there are 4,800,000 veteran Soldiers, Sailors,and Marines and they should stick together in the American Legion. Illustration shows two emblems for the American Legion.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I

Title: 4,800,000 of us :  let's stick together
